description: Moisture-wicking liner socks with minimal cushioning to keep your feet cool and comfortable. Wear them next to your skin under a pair of hiking socks to help manage sweat and cut down on friction. Of course, you can wear them alone as a comfy everyday sock too.Made of moisture-wicking Coolmax® polyester, nylon, Endurofil polypropylene and elastane.Performance fit is supportive from foot to calf.Flat toe seam feels smooth in your boots.Includes 2 pairs of liner socks.
name: Bridgedale Liner Coolmax Crew 2 Pack Socks - Unisex
